channel.title: 3D Reconstruction from the ROV Deep Discoverer
channel.description: Recent content on 3D Reconstruction from the ROV Deep Discoverer

item.title: Experiments in PoTree
item.description: I’m trying PoTree as a tool for publishing point clouds. Model “approach_wing” here Model “engine_detail” here

item.title: Sample Datasets
item.description: Links to the sample data sets used in this project. All photosets are stored as .zip archives of png images. Dive EX1605L3_DIVE04 hillside top of slope Dive EX1605L3_DIVE22 approaching wing engine one engine detail

item.title: Charter
item.description: Current Version: 10 November 2016 History available through Github Project Title: 3D Reconstruction from ROV Camera Arrays of Opportunity Project Start Date: 1 November 2016 Project End Date: 31 October 2018 Project Description Produce 3D reconstructions from archival OER video from the Deep Discoverer (D2) ROV and Seirios vehicles. Show the utility of 3D reconstruction for public outreach and for achieving science goals. Project Boundaries Focus on archival data.
